name: HSP_ACCT_AR_AC_SUM
description: This table contains the archived account summary information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the archived hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each account archive summary will have its own line number.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_ACCT_SUMM
columns.description: The archived account summary for the hospital account.
